    question => string (686) "<p>19. Scrutinise the following for evidence of undisclosed related party tr...
    $value[18]['question']
    <p>19.	Scrutinise the following for evidence of undisclosed related party transactions (this should include liaison with other departments within the audit firm):</p>
<ul>
    <li>third party and counter party confirmations received during the audit;</li>
    <li>analytical procedures;</li>
    <li>invoices / correspondence with legal and other professional advisers;</li>
    <li>tax returns and correspondence with the appropriate taxation authority;</li>
    <li>statutory records;</li>
    <li>information supplied to regulators; </li>
    <li>correspondence with the pension scheme; and</li>
    <li>shareholder and board minutes. <strong>(C, E, V)</strong> </li>
</ul>

    question => UTF-8 string (620) "<p>20. Scrutinise the following for evidence of undisclosed related party tr...
    $value[19]['question']
    <p>20.	Scrutinise the following for evidence of undisclosed related party transactions:</p>
<ul>
    <li>investments in entities which have not been identified as being related parties (and are not listed investments);</li>
    <li>loans to entities which have not been identified as being related parties;</li>
    <li>guarantees provided, which are on behalf of entities or individuals which have not been identified as being related parties;</li>
    <li>the provision of services which are not part of the normal course of business, or are not on “commercial terms”. <strong>(C, E, V)</strong></li>
</ul>
